price: Kuma ga kõwace al'umma akwai Manzo*. Sa'an nan idan Manzonsu ya je, sai a yi hukunci a tsakãninsu da ãdalci, kuma sũ, bã a zãluntar su.
arabic: وَلِكُلِّ أُمَّةٖ رَّسُولٞۖ فَإِذَا جَآءَ رَسُولُهُمۡ قُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُم بِٱلۡقِسۡطِ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: * Manzo na farko shĩ ne mai shiryar da su, Manzo na biyu shi ne Ajalinsu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walikulli ummatin rasūlun fa-idhā jāa rasūluhum quḍiya baynahum bil-qis'ṭi wahum lā yuẓ'lamūna
